item.title: About the phrase "Parking downhill"
item.description: From https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=23118940 Before putting a project or incomplete task away, make notes of what the next thing was that you were going to work on. This lets you bypass that 10 minute orientation getting back into the project the next time you pick it up.
